segments.text: Everyone wants to be financial lose kill . You must invest your savings if you planed to retire rich . I ’ m thinking about buying stocks . It can be a good investment if I can manage well . What do you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I partly agree with you . Buying stocks is not difficult , but making money consistently from buying stock is very difficult . Even professionals don ’ t find it easy , so be careful . Anyway , people like us need help with investing . Why not do some online research ? There are data , reports and discussion forums to educate people on how to invest . In addition , you need to visit an established website that offers stock charts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just watched the investment TV program last weekend . It has become a very hot topic these days . Actually I am not even a beginner .
segments.speaker: S2
